channel.title: Integration Tests on On Software Development
channel.description: Recent content in Integration Tests on On Software Development

item.title: WebCalc iteration 1 - setting up with one test
item.description: Welcome to the first iteration of WebCalc implementation. In my previous post I just explained my motivations and goals for this project. This time I’ll do some actual coding. Although in the end, I’ll try to have something “business” related, I guess most of the time I’ll spend wiring things up. To the keyboard then. Goal I want to have a very first and simple test working: adding 1 to 2.
